instructions:
Mix above ingredients and pat into a loaf. Place on a rack covered with aluminum foil in a baking dish or
casserole. Bake uncovered in 375 F oven for 45 minutes and then add 2 or 3 tbsp water to the bottom of the
baking dish. Continue roasting uncovered for another 30 minutes, or until the meat loaf reaches an internal
temperature of 160 F. 
*(Rev. 12/3/96)*
ingredients: 2 lb. meat loaf mix (ground beef, veal and pork)
1 envelope G Washington Brown seasoning mix
1 envelope McCormick meat loaf seasoning mix
name: Meat Loaf
